name: COMPOUND IX
description:
Explore the facility where monsters and unknown beings roam around. Scientists can no longer fight back and it is up to you to defeat the enemies and make it out alive. Can you survive Compound IX?

Using WASD to move the player, collect key cards and read the terminals to unlock spells, and test your typing skills by defeating the enemies. When fighting, every word can be typed. Type your words to inflict damage to the enemy, type spells to cast them, and type enemy words to cancel them.
